hero.subtitle:
A beautiful, private, and open-source investment tracker. 
 Forked from <0>Wealthfolio</0> to provide a refined, standalone Desktop <1>All-in-one</1> experience.

desktop.title: Desktop Focused
desktop.desc: Optimized strictly for macOS and Windows. No mobile compromises.

privacy.title: Local & Private
privacy.desc: Your data stays on your device. No servers, no tracking, complete privacy.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.desc: Transparent code. Forked from Wealthfolio, maintained by the community.
